    H

    handleAllPending(String) - Method in class InventoryManagement
    Processes and approves all pending replenishment requests, updating the stock levels and marking each request as approved by the specified individual.
    handleAllPending(String) - Method in interface PendingManagement
    Processes and approve all items marked as pending.
    handleAllPending(String) - Method in class PrescriptionManagement
    Processes and approves all pending prescriptions by dispensing the requested items if sufficient stock is available.

    I

    Inventory - package Inventory
     
    inventoryData - Variable in class InventoryManagement
     
    inventoryManagement - Variable in class PrescriptionManagement
     
    InventoryManagement - Class in Inventory
    The InventoryManagement class provides comprehensive functionality for managing inventory items, including viewing, submitting replenishment requests, restocking, and handling pending requests.
    InventoryManagement(dataReader, dataWriter) - Constructor for class InventoryManagement
    Constructs an InventoryManagement instance and loads all inventory data from the "Medicine_List.csv" file at initialization.

    P

    PendingManagement - Interface in Inventory
    The PendingManagement interface defines methods for managing items with a pending status.
    PrescriptionManagement - Class in Inventory
    The PrescriptionManagement class handles dispensing and approval of prescriptions.
    PrescriptionManagement(InventoryManagement, dataReader, dataWriter) - Constructor for class PrescriptionManagement
    Constructs a PrescriptionManagement instance that interacts with InventoryManagement for stock management, linking inventory controls with prescription processing.

    R

    ReplenishmentService - Interface in Inventory
    The ReplenishmentService interface provides methods for managing inventory replenishment.
    restockItemByName(String, int) - Method in class InventoryManagement
    Restocks a specified quantity of a medicine by its name.
    restockItemByName(String, int) - Method in interface ReplenishmentService
    Restocks an item by the specified quantity.
    restockItemByRequestID(String, String) - Method in class InventoryManagement
    Approves a replenishment request by its ID and updates the inventory stock.
    restockItemByRequestID(String, String) - Method in interface ReplenishmentService
    Approves a replenishment request based on the unique request ID and updates the inventory.
